topic.title: Auction sale site YouTube
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/

Interested in what price you would buy this site.
Price write in bitcoins.

I'm not going to sell it yet, but I'm wondering who is willing to pay for the site in the ZeroNet.

1551790772_19Yj3z87qtP6CoPvXNSYzTZjeZnvJ.body:
About the fact that this is a clone of KKBO and so everyone knows already discussed many times about it.
KKBO does not sell its website, but we are interested in how much the website costs in ZeroNet.

> [bitwolf](#comment_21_1Kq1ox6SsERUFsQjyGCLKf7EuHJuDs3wfu): It's looking like a good enough zite for functionality, with plenty of value - but I'd suggest that the copyrighted/trademarked things are changed prior to any sale taking place, next thing you know, someone does something foolish and whammo, ZeroNet makes headlines for being the next dark web where anyone can pirate copyrighted/trademarked stuff and someone who just bought a zite gets the turds sued straight out of their bowels because there's a YT-logo on their non-YT zite.

The logo is a mockery in the direction of the original YouTube, in order to show that they can be replaced in a ZeroNet.

> [bitwolf](#comment_23_1Kq1ox6SsERUFsQjyGCLKf7EuHJuDs3wfu): Oh, well, I guess that'll show YouTube's department of lawyers who each make more money than you or I see all year, and surely that'll make any judge rule in your favor... in fact, maybe you should be sueing them pre-emptively, teach them a lesson... because I love a good slapstick comedy. [...]

lol
